metadata.title: USN-6142-1 -- nghttp2 vulnerability
metadata.description: Gal Goldshtein discovered that nghttp2 incorrectly handled certain inputs. If a user or an automated system were tricked into opening a specially crafted input file, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6142-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libnghttp2-14 - 1.40.0-1ubuntu0.1 libnghttp2-doc - 1.40.0-1ubuntu0.1 libnghttp2-dev - 1.40.0-1ubuntu0.1 nghttp2-proxy - 1.40.0-1ubuntu0.1 nghttp2 - 1.40.0-1ubuntu0.1 nghttp2-client - 1.40.0-1ubuntu0.1 nghttp2-server - 1.40.0-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
